decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p>Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</p><p>REASON: In order to ensure that the proposal does not contribute to local flood risk<br></p>

<div><p>Prior to occupation of the development hereby approved, the AC unit acoustic mitigation measures as recommended within Section 6 of submitted Acoustic report&nbsp;<span id="gmail-docs-internal-guid-a704f5d2-7fff-55d1-b042-7c6cb9ee3a7c"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">28698.PCR.01 by KP Acoustics, shall be implemented, as a minimum.</span></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;The plant shall only operate in accordance with the details of the Noise Report with the plant being at least 5dB below the prevailing background noise level (LA90, T)&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">as assessed according to BS4142:2014 at the nearest and/or most affected noise sensitive premises, with all machinery operating.</span>&nbsp;The equipment shall be maintained thereafter to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>REASON:&nbsp; To protect the amenity of noise sensitive premises from noise from mechanical plant.&nbsp; &nbsp;</p></div>
description: Erection of ground floor side return and small rear extension, second floor outrigger roof extension and attic conversion with rear dormer and air conditioning unit.
